doc.title: 1970 Hot Summer Special
doc.plot: Collection of ten Athletic Model Guild (AMG) shorts, packaged for feature length theatrical release. Some shorts included in this program are "Getting Teacher's Goatee", the sci-fi themed "Love 2001", "Jonny's Birthday Present", "Love for a Professor" and "Love '& Impudent' is the Sailor".
